./external/basejump_stl/bsg_mem/bsg_mem_1r1w_synth.v Cov: 100% 

   1: // MBT
   2: //
   3: // 1 read-port, 1 write-port ram
   4: //
   5: // reads are asynchronous
   6: //
   7: // for synthesizable internal version, we omit assertions
   8: // these should be placed in the outer wrapper
   9: //
  10: 
  11: module bsg_mem_1r1w_synth #(parameter width_p=-1
  12: 			    ,parameter els_p=-1
  13: 			    ,parameter read_write_same_addr_p=0
  14: 			    ,parameter addr_width_lp=`BSG_SAFE_CLOG2(els_p)
  15: 			    ,parameter harden_p=0)
  16: (
  17:   input w_clk_i
  18:   ,input w_reset_i
  19: 
  20:   ,input w_v_i
  21:   ,input [addr_width_lp-1:0] w_addr_i
  22:   ,input [width_p-1:0] w_data_i
  23: 
  24:   // currently unused
  25:   ,input r_v_i
  26:   ,input [addr_width_lp-1:0]  r_addr_i
  27: 
  28:   ,output logic [width_p-1:0] r_data_o
  29: );
  30: 
  31:   logic [width_p-1:0] mem [els_p-1:0];
  32: 
  33:   wire unused0 = w_reset_i;
  34:   wire unused1 = r_v_i;
  35: 
  36:   // this implementation ignores the r_v_i
  37:   assign r_data_o = mem[r_addr_i];
  38: 
  39:   always_ff @(posedge w_clk_i) begin
  40:     if (w_v_i) begin
  41:       mem[w_addr_i] <= w_data_i;
  42:     end
  43:   end
  44: 
  45: endmodule
  46:
